c74object.name: sy.perm
c74object.description: Find all character permutations of input symbols.

inlet.description: A list will be converted into a single symbol

method.name: anything
method.description: Any output is converted to a single symbol, and all the character permutations of such symbol are the output, either one by one or in list form (depending on the autoiter attribute), from the outlet.

method.name: bang
method.description: Output the permations computed on the most recently received input symbols.

attribute.name: autoiter
attribute.description: Toggles the ability to spit permutations one by one, instead of listing them. Defaults to 1.

attribute.name: listin
unique
attribute.description: Toggles the ability to only output repeated permutations once. Defaults to 1.

c74object.discussion: It takes all the input and convert it into a single symbol (if it was not a symbol already)

entry.name: Inlet 1 (anything)
entry.description: Original symbol. A list will be converted into a single symbol
